name: Golden Brown Hand Stitched Leather Satchel Bag
description:
Made from soft, rich brown leather with a subtle dusted gold finish which sparkles in sunlight. 

I cut each piece by hand and then hand stitched it together using traditional saddle stitch - two needles and waxed linen thread.

The bag has a single compartment 11.5 inches wide, 9 inches high with a 3 inch gusset - so there's plenty of room to fit in all your essential items. An ideal bag for school, college or the office. 

Fastening with a single buckle and with a strap that adjusts from 41 inches to 46 inches it can be worn on the shoulder or across the body.

Please note the picture was taken in full sunlight - the gold shimmery finish is much more subtle when not in full sun.

name: Sassy Blue Hand Stitched Leather Satchel Bag
description:
This bag is as sassy as sassy can be - a real head turner!

Made from a black and blue mock snakeskin leather which I cut by hand and then hand stitched together using traditional saddle stitch - two needles and waxed linen thread.

The bag is 13 inches wide and 10.5 inches high, with a 3 inch deep single compartment large enough to fill with large books, notepads and all your essential items. An ideal bag for school, college or the office.

Fastening with a single push button lock and with a good long adjustable strap it can be worn on the shoulder or across the body.
